Html:
I get "The connection was reset" when running ./Examples/27imagesexcel5.php
The excel files are generated though.

For some reason this won't happen if I run system('pwd'); anywhere in the script. But there still is a problem. There is no echo. Only fatal errors get shown.

PHP 5.2.6
PHPExcel_1.7.9_pdf.zip
Apache 2.0
Linux 2.6.26-smp x86_64 GNU/Linux

I think the problem might be triggered by something in PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5->load() at the while loop located at line 747. Or there might be some php.ini misconfiguration or something. I don't know... I can't figure it out.

The only way I could get the output of the php is by buffering it with ob_start(), ob_get_clean(), ob_end_clean().

Any ideas?
